heroSection.description: Web Developer, and Tech Enthusiast. Interested in everything related to the Web, Networking & the tech world.

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.intro: Hi, I'm Chakib Ouzane (aka ch33kaboo), a 22-year-old final-year Computer Science student from Algeria. As a full-stack web developer, I have a passion for building efficient, scalable backend systems alongside their intuitive, responsive frontend experiences to create seamless full-stack solutions.
aboutSection.portfolio: My portfolio showcases a range of projects that reflect my skills and enthusiasm for development.
aboutSection.goals: I'm continuously exploring new technologies and working on projects that challenge me to grow. My goal is to contribute to innovative projects that push the boundaries of web development.
aboutSection.additionalInterests: Alongside web development, I’m also interested in networking and IoT, and I’ve had the opportunity to experiment with these technologies in university labs.

projectsSection.title: Projects and Contributions
projectsSection.description: Here are projects that I worked on, also some small contributions that I made to open-source projects.

project1.description: I developed a website for the AlphaBit Club community, where visitors can explore the club's recent events, partners, blog, podcasts, and other additional information.
project1.keyFeatures: The website's content is dynamic, as it is written in Markdown format in <a href='https://github.com/ch33kaboo/alphabit-CMS-test' class='link'>this GitHub repository<a/>. Whenever a visitor enters a page, the website fetches the corresponding content from the repository, parses the Markdown files to HTML, and renders them for the client. Additionally, the website is responsive and supports dark mode.

blogSection.title: Blog
blogSection.description:
I’m a huge fan of Obsidian and frequently write about various topics in my Obsidian vault. Some articles are tech-related, some others are not.
Once uploaded, they will be available at blog.chakib.tech.

contactSection.title: Get in Touch
contactSection.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions. Feel free to reach out!
